channel.title: What do I put in my runserver box if I have split the class and the CFG'S
channel.description:
Hi,
I have moved my class files and the CFG files, both to different folders, I put this in my compiler:
[code]@echo off echo Compiling Game Files "c:\program files\java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin\javac.exe" -cp ./Class -d ./CFG ./*.java pause[/code]
But what do I put in my runserver?
Thanks
Musicmad

item.title: What do I put in my runserver box if I have split the class and the CFG'S
item.dc:creator: @musicmad441 Musicmad
item.description:
@musicmad441 wrote:

[quote=“GoldenScape, post:4, topic:184021”]Can you insert a path to the files?
I’m not sure.Why did you move the files anyways?[/quote]

I had too many files. Like al my classes and Java files.

Read full topic

item.title: What do I put in my runserver box if I have split the class and the CFG'S
item.dc:creator: @musicmad441 Musicmad
item.description:
@musicmad441 wrote:

[quote=“GoldenScape, post:2, topic:184021”]@echo off COLOR 04 title Run the server-By rs w00dcut---You can change this text :D java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
Tell me if it helped.[/quote]

Says like exception, think I need to tell it what to run, and where the class files are.

Read full topic

item.title: What do I put in my runserver box if I have split the class and the CFG'S
item.dc:creator: @GoldenScape GoldenScape
item.description:
@GoldenScape wrote:

@echo off COLOR 04 title Run the server-By rs w00dcut---You can change this text :D java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
Tell me if it helped.
